text: wya qawm aemaluu kl ma tastatieun ealaa tryqtkm whaltkm, 'iiniy eamil mthabr ealaa tryqty wama whbny rabiy min daeawtukum 'iilaa altwhyd, sawf taelamun man minaa yatih eadhab ydhlluh, wman minaa kadhib fi qwlh, 'ana 'am antm? wantaziruu ma syhl bikum 'iiniy maeakum min almntzryn. whdha tahdid shadid lhm
